heading: Blind Burrows Dungeon Guide
content: Blind Burrows has a very convoluted layout and hosts dangerous Spiders which are known for their powerful webs and explosions upon death (Spider Hosts). It is a solid farm, but is not currently a possible . The Broodguard boss can you with its web, but otherwise is harmless. This dungeon unlocks the , a solid offensive aspect for a Druid. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
